data.title: The Kingdom of Kongo 1400-1709
data.meta_description: In this podcast Dr Toby Green of King's College London discusses the Kingdom of Kongo.
data.text:
In this podcast Dr Toby Green of King's College London discusses the Kingdom of Kongo.

1. What were the reasons for the rise of Kongo?

2. How did the Kongo develop?

3. How did the Catholic Church develop in Kongo?

4. How successful were the manikongos?

5. How successful was Kongo in their relations with the Portuguese and Dutch?

6. Why did the Kingdom of Kongo collapse?

7. What was the legacy of the Kingdom of Kongo?
